title: Retta I Locked My Heart & I Found The Key Men's & Women's Matching Couples T-Shirt Set
features: Celebrate your love with our men's and women's matching couple shirts. Designed and printed in the USA.
Men's tee: 100% preshrunk cotton / Women's tee: 100% preshrunk cotton, feminine rib mid scoop neck; sideseamed with slightly tapered Missy fit
Men's Shirt Sizing (Width x Length): Small = 18.0" x 28.0" / Medium = 20.0" x 29.0" / Large = 22.0" x 30.0" / X-Large = 24.0" x 31.0" / XX-Large = 26.0" x 32.0" / XXX-Large = 28.0" x 33.0"
Women's Shirt Sizing (Width x Length): Small = 17.25" x 25.5" / Medium = 19.25" x 26.0" / Large = 21.25" x 27.0" / X-Large = 23.25" x 28.0" / XX-Large = 25.25" x 28.5"
description: Men's and women's tees designed and printed in the USA using the latest printing technology. We offer a wide-variety of sizes and colors to fit all your needs. Check out our other products and thank you for shopping with Retta Tees!
